text: What is vowel harmony in the Turkish language?
option_1: A rule that classifies words based on their consonants
option_2: A pattern where vowels in a phonological rule where vowels within a word harmonize to be either front or back
option_3: A principle that only affects borrowed words"
option_4: A rule that alters verb conjugation endings
